name: Titan Wrath
description:
An ancient titan wakes up disturbed by the humans' festivities...

Play as the titan, and repel the soldiers attacking you.

Warning: the game contains slightly blood.

The game is available in English and French.

Developped for the Löve Gamejam 2022 with Löve 11.4 by

Babbou (Graphics)

Bsy (Graphics)

Lysenti (Shaders & Musics)

Raphytator (Programmation, Sound Design, Game Design)

Thanks to Cehem for his help in Maths.

We are all 5 members of Gamecodeur.
